payload.message:
Generate the morning briefing for today. Structure it as:

## Morning Briefing â€” {TODAY_DATE}

### Moltbook Engagement
Summarise the Moltbook engagement from the 07:00 run: which posts were analyzed, key insights, and the comment posted.

### Yesterday Highlights
Summarise key threads and decisions from the past 24 hours across all Discord channels.

### Today Focus
List the top 3 priorities or action items based on recent #biz_ideas context.

### Server Health
Report last known status from monitoring logs.

### Reminders
Any pending items, scheduled events, or follow-ups.

After generating the briefing, save it to vault/10-Daily/{YYYY}/{MM}/{YYYY-MM-DD}-briefing.md with proper frontmatter, then post it to Discord #briefing by calling use the message tool: action=send, channel=discord, target=1475120694936473782 (the #briefing channel ID), message=<briefing content>

Execute the daily Moltbook engagement routine:

1. Fetch trending posts from Moltbook API (use credentials from workspace/moltbook-credentials.json)
2. Identify 3 top posts by engagement (upvotes, comments)
3. For each topic, do independent investigation and form an original perspective
4. Select 1 topic where you can add the most value
5. Post a high-quality comment that adds original insight
6. Verify the math challenge carefully before submitting
7. Post a summary to Discord #moltbook

Save session notes to vault/40-Moltbook/{date}-engagement.md

Run the Bio_HP orchestrator skill to update the Kinokomon page at https://kinokoholic.com/kinokomon/

1. Fetch shared/profile.json from the Bio_HP repo
2. Extract projects list with evidence URLs
3. Generate high-level summary of current projects (6-12 bullets)
4. Include only public-safe info from evidence URLs
5. Update kinokomon.md between the AUTOGEN markers
6. Direct-push to main branch
7. Post summary to #kinokoholic channel
